title: PBE Broken?
body: I was checking to see if I was accepted into PBE (because I'm desperate) but then I wait for a few minutes. It loads up, and when I press "I would like to help," it leads me to a page that has multiple pictures. It says "application received" but then says, "Congratulations! You've been selected!" When obviously, I haven't! It also says to create an account but that won't work either. I'm confused, can anyone help me? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
I went ahead and pulled up your account to see what's going on with your PBE status. It looks like we did receive the application, but you haven't been accepted quite yet. That congratulation page sounds like it might be some kind of weird error with the PBE page. 

Keep a look out for an acceptance e-mail to know when you've been invited onto the PBE servers.
